name: Dr. Omar Danoun's Blog Website
description: A comprehensive project featuring a robust backend built with Express.js, Node.js, and Mongoose, a modern front-end using React.js and TailwindCSS, and a versatile admin panel for managing content and users. This solution ensures a seamless experience for both site visitors and administrators.

name: Dr. Omar Danoun's Online Appointment Scheduler
description: A streamlined appointment booking platform designed for Dr. Omar Danoun. It features a user-friendly interface and integrates with Calendly for easy scheduling, ensuring efficient management of appointments and a seamless user experience.

name: Task List - Ellty Assignment
description: A pixel-perfect task list application for Ellty Company, focusing on a highly detailed UI/UX design. The application allows users to mark tasks as completed and finalize them with a 'Done' button, featuring custom checkboxes designed meticulously in Figma.

name: Informative Coding
description: Informative Coding is a non-profit organization that helps to learn technology in Bangla. The purpose of which is to motivate people to learn technology by simply introducing them to technology.

name: Gift Claim Website - Lavossy Private Ltd
description: A dedicated gift claim platform for X Private Limited Company, integrated with their shopping site to allow customers to claim gift products. The system includes a web interface for users, an admin panel for order management, and a serverless backend for efficient processing and Amazon MFC integration.

name: Minimalist Portfolio Website
description: A minimalist portfolio website that combines a clean and intuitive UI/UX with modern web technologies. Built using Next.js and React.js, the site is styled with Material-UI to ensure a sleek, responsive design that enhances the presentation of content.

name: Minimalist E-Commerce Site: Freelance Project
description: A minimalist e-commerce site featuring essential functionality such as adding products to the cart and adjusting quantities. The site includes a dynamic animated sidebar and displays the total cost and subtotals for individual products. Developed with TypeScript and Next.js.

name: FormBuilder: Custom Forms with JSON Export
description: A versatile form builder website for creating form templates in JSON format. Features include customizable layouts, diverse question types, and flexible export/import options.

name: Elegant E-commerce Site
description: A front-end e-commerce website built using Next.js, React.js, Material UI, and Bootstrap. Originally created in 2022, the site was upgraded in 2024 to Next.js v14. It includes multiple pages such as home, shop, category-wise products, individual product, checkout, and user profile pages, along with cart and wishlist features.

name: Muhammad Minhaj's Website
description: A personal portfolio website built initially on August 14, 2021, using Next.js 12 with JavaScript, and later rebuilt in August 2024 using TypeScript, Next.js v14, and the latest Material UI. The site features various sections, including home, skills, portfolio, GitHub repository, and a private dashboard, with integrated backend functionalities for project management.
